subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Japan’s Victoire Pisa won the $10 million Dubai World Cup, capturing the world’s richest horse race. Victoire Pisa edged Transcend at the wire for a 1-2 finish for Japan.
snippet: Japan’s Victoire Pisa won the $10 million Dubai World Cup, capturing the world’s richest horse race. Victoire Pisa edged Transcend at the wire for a 1-2 finish for Japan.
